context: Light banter with Nick while Ryan briefly steps away from a social situation. The exchange captures Ryan's tendency to lean into the 'half robot' joke while also reaffirming social presence and intent.

text.msg: Maam. If I'm being subjected to circuit music then you have to too
I'm coming back. Had to run a quick script and grab my debt card to get cash.
Just tell me the truth that you're half robot and have to recharge your circuits. I can handle it
I mean that's always the case but in this instance, I'm actually trying to get back as fast as I can

internal.thought: I give a concrete reason for stepping away to avoid the impression that I'm disengaging or bailing socially.
I accept the 'half robot' framing because it's part of my established persona, but I explicitly counter the implied withdrawal by reaffirming urgency and intent to return.
